title: How does LazyPay work? : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
LazyPay is one the fastest and simplest way to make payments online!
To choose LazyPay as a mode of payment simply click on “More payment options” on the payment page and tap on the “Pay Later” option.
Thereafter an OTP is sent to you for verification, post entering the OTP your transaction is processed.
> LazyPay statement is generated twice a month:
16th of every month:
For transactions done between the 1st to the 15th month.
For e.g. Transactions done from 1st of April to 15th of April, the statement is sent to you on the 16th of April, the same must be repaid by the 18th of April.
1st of every month:
For transactions done between the 16th to the last day of the previous month.
For e.g. Transactions done from the 16th of April to the 30th of April, the statement is sent to you on the 1st of May, the same must be repaid by the 3rd of May.
You may also log in to the LazyPay website/app to complete the credit payment availed or follow the link shared by LazyPay in the SMS
